install_commands.with_file_processing: npm install @aws-sdk/client-bedrock-runtime @aws-sdk/client-bedrock-agent @aws-sdk/client-bedrock-agent-runtime @aws-sdk/client-s3 multer pdf-parse mammoth xlsx

notes.aws_sdk: Use v3 AWS SDK for better performance and tree-shaking
notes.file_processing: PDF, DOCX, and Excel processing are optional - install only what you need
notes.existing_deps: Keep your existing dependencies - these are additions only
